section.name: CEA Programmer Guide for Applications

subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This guide is intended for people simply wanting to implement a new application under the CEA framework. It is intended that this will often be a case of "configuration" rather than programming, but if a particularly difficult application wrapping is being attempted, then it might be necessary to consult the full programmers guide

section.subsection: see CommandLine Configuration for more details.

subsection.name: DataCenter
subsection.p: Although this interface is not maintained as part of this project, it does implement the CommonExecutionConnector interface, so it is worth giving an overview here.
